document_data.name: Eyeless Mask
document_data.mainbody: The '''Eyeless Mask''' was a sinister organization dedicated to enslaving all [[wizard]]s, [[cleric]]s, and nobility.
document_data.Organization: The majority of power within in the Eyeless Mask came from 14 extremely secretive [[Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]]. The remaining members were [[thieves]], priests of unknown faiths, and warriors.
document_data.Activities: Members of this group kidnapped spellcasters, priests, and nobility. They especially enjoyed preying on visitors to the city. The Red Wizards within the Eyeless Mask were after as much [[magic]] as they could get their hands on, believing that in doing so they would weaken the area for a future invasion from Thay.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Eyeless Mask held the most influence within the cities of [[Saerloon]] and [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[Sembia]].
